p: Linalool (13.9%), lavandulyl acetate (11.5%), (E)-β-ocimene (8.6%), terpinen-4-o1(7.7%) and lavandulol (6.6%) were found to be the main constituents of the essential oil of S. suffruticosa collected from Shirkouh mountain, Yazd (Rustaiyan et al., 1999 ▶) and cis-β-ocimene (12.9%), linalool (9.5%), γ-terpinene (9.0%) and α-terpinolene (7.4%) were recognized as major components of S. suffruticosa collected from Taftan mountain, Zahedan (Mottaghipisheh et al., 2017 ▶).
